name: Tomato Pork Chops I
author: Charmaine
summary: These are sauteed pork chops smothered in a tomato sauce with fresh onion and bell pepper. It's a fairly quick and simple recipe. Try serving with rice.
ingredients: 1  bell pepper - chopped, your color choice
directions: Heat enough oil to just cover the bottom of a large skillet over medium high heat
Dredge the pork chops in flour, add to pan and brown well on both sides
Add the onion and bell pepper and cook and stir for 5 minutes, or until almost tender
Return pork chops to skillet and pour in the tomato sauce
Allow the sauce to start bubbling and then reduce heat to low
Simmer for 30 minutes and season with garlic powder, salt and pepper to taste
